content_by_page.0: parent:div:[text:State and Federal Crime Laboratories \ Medical Examiners and Coroners \ Law Enforcement Agencies \ Hospital Emergency Rooms \ Drug Agencies,text:Using innovative filtration technology, the Safeswab drying cabinet creates a safe work environment over the widest range of applications in the industry.]
content_by_page.1: parent:div:[text:Safekeeper Forensic Evidence Drying Cabinets provide cost-effective storage and containment for forensic evidence as it is dried by a constant flow of air. Air Science® ductless technology removes airborne pathogens, particulates, fumes and odors emitted by the contents. Using innovative filtration technology, the forensic evidence drying cabinet creates a safe work environment over the widest range of applications in the industry.,text:State and Federal Crime Laboratories \ Medical Examiners and Coroners \ Law Enforcement Agencies \ Hospital Emergency Rooms \ Drug Agencies]

content_by_page.1: parent:select:[text:FDC-BASIC-A - Portable, PVC frame set-up, mesh fabric wrap.]

content_by_page.0: parent:div:[parent:p:[text:With a HEPA main filter formulated to contain any particulates or biological material that might be present on swabs, SafeSWAB® is used to safely dry evidence swabs while protecting them from cross-contamination.],text:Description]
content_by_page.1: parent:div:[parent:p:[text:The Evidence Transporter is a special-purpose basic evidence transporter and storage cabinet designed to maintain the chain of custody in transport from the field to the laboratory, while allowing effective air-drying prior to evidence processing.],text:Description]
content_by_page.2: parent:div:[parent:p:[text:We build custom enclosures for specific customer requirements and applications. Each unit is designed to maximize operator safety and accessibility, and is tested and certified to factory specifications and industry standards.],text:Customized Cabinet and Containment Enclosures]
